features: Great Value Sticky Notes - Our bright colors sticky notes are 3x3 inches, 80 sheets/pad, and include 8 pads, offering a generous total of 640 sheets to cater to all your note-taking. 8 bright colors are very convenient for classifying various notes and meeting all kinds of classification needs. Easy to post for home, office, and school supplies.

8 Bright Colors - Comes in 8 colors ( red, pink, orange, yellow, green, light blue, blue, purple ), Bright sticky notes making your message more noticeable. Self-stick notes with bright and vivid colors, you can use specific colors to categorize, to allow you to mark and retrieve information quickly and easily.

Sticky & Reusable - Our sticky notes have a strong adhesive backing, which uses water-based (not chemical based) adhesive, no worry of peeling off quickly. But can also be repositioned without leaving residue, you can take them off without ripping the paper or page. Strong sticky, durable, reusable, and easily recyclable.

High Quality and Portable - Our sticky notes are made of thick paper, no ink-seepage, environmental protection material, smooth writing, and special technology. They are neat, compact, and slim. Perfect to carry or to fit in your bag. Keep it on your desk or in your drawer to access them handily.

Wide Application - With the ability to stick and re-stick very suitable for recording important notes like courses, projects, essays, tests, chapters, dates, textbooks, recipes, readings, etc. Easily mark your important information or content. Perfect for various uses like reminders, messages, task organization, and more. Also used for school, office, and family. Great for leaving notes or reminders on walls, doors, fridges, monitors, or other surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Sticky Notes set offers convenience and organization with its 3x3 inches self-stick pads featuring 8 vibrant colors. With 8 pads in total, each containing 80 sheets, it's ideal for home, office, or school use. Whether you're jotting down reminders, marking important points, or leaving messages, these sticky notes make it easy to stay organized. The variety of colors adds a touch of fun and functionality to any workspace, while the adhesive backing ensures they stick securely to most surfaces. Perfect for teachers, students, or anyone in need of study supplies, these cute sticky note pads are a versatile addition to any stationery collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty colored sticky notes!
reviews.reviewText: These are 16 sticky note pads, two of each of eight colors. The colors are not super neon, but some are bright. There is a pale purple/lavender, a light blue, regular yellow and peach that are more pastel. Then there is an orange that is brighter, a darker pink, a lime green and a darker blue. I wouldn't call them neon, but bright. Either way, a pen would easily show up on any of the colors.I even used a blue ballpoint pen on the bright blue and it showed up fine. However, I will say that in my quest to find a blue pen, I went through a lot of dead pens in my house. When I scribbled on the blue pad to test out the pens, those marks went through onto the next sheet. So these notes are very thin.I continued my testing by using a Sharpie and writing on one of the pads. Without pressing very hard and just writing "hello" with Sharpie, it bled through onto the next sheet as well. So keep that in mind, depending on what you plan to use these for.The sticky factor was fine. They seem a little less sticky than other name brand sticky notes, but it stuck to the table and my shirt just fine. My daughter uses these to make notes on books that she is reading and they stick to book pages just fine without falling out even after turning the pages.Overall, they are great colors and fun, but the paper is a little thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As I am becoming a connoisseur of all things related to Post-it notes, forgive me, sticky notes… I am starting to be able to tell the difference between one batch and another. What stands out about this particular batch? I like the colors, they are slightly different shades than what I already have. Next, they separate easily. Some pads of sticky notes can have such strong adhesive that when they pull apart, they actually leave some sticky rescue on the next note, this set of sticky notes. Does not do that. It’s possible that the sticky on these might be a little wimpy, but if I have to choose, I would prefer that to having the sticky so strong that it leaves residue on the next note or even breaks down the top note when you pull it off. Overall, I’m very pleased with this set of sticky notes as well as the very, nice price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sticky notes!
reviews.reviewText: These sticky notes are very similar to name brand and work well for me. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sticky notes that stick
reviews.reviewText: There's really not much to say about sticky notes, but these fit the bill. They are sufficiently sticky and the paper isn't tissue thin. My package contains 1280 notes, so I don't expect I'll ever run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Average sticky notes. Not the same quality as name brand sticky notes.
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the Sticky Notes 3x3 inches, 16 Pads Self-Stick Notes with 8 Bright Colors as I received this product free of charge through the Amazon Vine Program in exchange for my honest opinion review- positive or negative.The colors of these sticky notes are vibrant and bold. Some look neon colors to me while others look pastel colors. They each measure 3x3 inches, come in 8 different colors, and the quantity listed on the sellers Amazon page “16 pack” were all there in my package. Now to the sticky part- let’s emphasize on the word S-T-I-C-K-Y- this is a feature that lacks on these self-stick notes because they don’t hold up very well wherever you decide to stick them on. The name brand sticky notes offer a more stronger adhesive sticky glue that sticks well to any surface or material. These don’t unfortunately and therefore is receiving a 3 star rating. These will work for me for the time being as I won’t be buying sticky notes for a while, however, I wouldn’t recommend getting these self-stick notes if the “sticky” feature is not as good which is the main reason you would purchase this pack of 16 self-stick note pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not very sticky
reviews.reviewText: Really nice colors. They aren't as sticky as post-it brand. However they don't curl up or have sticky residue on the front like other off-brands. They stick well enough to papers, but a stuck a few notes on some plastic bins and at least one had fallen off the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jumlys Sticky Notes 3x3 inches, 16 Pads - mark it up!
reviews.reviewText: The 3x3 sticky notes came with 16 pads in a variety of 8 bright colors with 80 sheets per pad.They performed as desired for easily organizing tasks and leaving notes. They properly adhered overnight to stainless steel and granite, as well as glass, and were easy to remove as needed.Brighten up your day with Jumlys Sticky Notes!
